## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                           | Type     | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | -------- | -------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | Determines the type of control that will be displayed | `string` | `'text'` |
| `value`  | `value`   | The value of the input "text"                         | `string` | `''`     |
